name: RetroScope
description: RetroScope is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. Its forest green box, combined with the nostalgic retro console buttons, gives it a unique vintage look. Equipped with sturdy soldier arms and legs, RetroScope is a reliable companion for any technological adventure. Its screen displays a classic game of Snake, providing both entertainment and functionality. With its impressive ability_scores and skills, RetroScope is ready to navigate the digital world with charisma, intelligence, and dexterity.
